content.title: You need a translation to continue
content.reason: You must upload an English translation of your marriage certificate.
content.advice: The certificate must be translated and certified by one of the following methods.
content.statementOfTruth_description1: The translator of your marriage certificate provides a statement of truth for certifying a translation.
content.statementOfTruth_description2: You can find translation services online which include certification as part of their service.
content.notaryPublic_description1: The marriage certificate is translated and then certified by a notary public.

content.advice: Rhaid cyfieithu ac ardystio’r dystysgrif priodas drwy un o'r dulliau canlynol:.
content.statementOfTruth_description1: Mae cyfieithydd eich tystysgrif priodas yn darparu datganiad o wirionedd i Ardystio’r cyfieithiad.
content.statementOfTruth_description2: Mae yna wasanaethau cyfieithu ar-lein sy’n cynnwys gwasanaeth ardystio.
